entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.5
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 20e274d4323ed36b8e2ac3eac3e46f7bbef5921b: feat: handlers return status of device action (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 24ed3c3f8fe0d05e40b7aedefb82230ae04c660c: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)
  • fec897944f3830fae325d8f09547511053af5c2f: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)
  • c4d93cdfadc77047678f059e7cbcd85f538e9831: Update Crowdin configuration file (@seriousm4x)

  • bf51b389c2305dfa2e2da77f2af33641f5d5acf1: rename translations to match locale names (@seriousm4x)
  • d40d2d1ee5b69cfe6c1b082f85b00c09ba988a8b: update all deps (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.6
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 0a7762e2b5af789c85f83c071e678b36fb713408: fix: date-fns not showing in other languages than english (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 74b8e350205039188816b53583a83dc4fb16bd1b: Added Korean i18n Support (#1151) (@zzunipark)
  • 4158c9f164f702e1fbb51772abd227f9ec044ef3: update deps (@seriousm4x)

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.7
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.0.8
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 1bf01cadc7f3f29b2f6145a2ad8206048809dc87: fix: only clear auth on 401 or 403, close #1158 (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 0efd8a8674f78c6272b714504f779835af23f1d5: update lock file (@seriousm4x)

Npm dependencies

  • 1bd2f64729f99e199d6cf919d62100c46781feab: npm-dep: bump svelte-check from 4.1.7 to 4.2.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 5.1.0
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 2ae595ad1304a873a9d9173afcd6fc7a67a605ea: feat(api): support async call (#1166) (@BlackHole1)
  • c05ea6266fe4da56673220713b69818f172c8d82: feat: add "wake group" button (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 2cb4ee3bf83076778bedeed6ff6b05aa84cf7457: fix: drop freebsd/arm support (modernc.org/sqlite does not support it) (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • 7d3ef22d61bd0f3a51b631567ef6842b5de5b2a9: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
